Load.name: Load
Load.description: This IPSO object should be used with a load sensor (as in a scale) to report the applied weight or force. It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor.

Sensor Value.name: Sensor Value
Sensor Value.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

Sensor Units.name: Sensor Units
Sensor Units.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius

Min Measured Value.name: Min Measured Value
Min Measured Value.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

Max Measured Value.name: Max Measured Value
Max Measured Value.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

Min Range Value.name: Min Range Value
Min Range Value.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

Max Range Value.name: Max Range Value
Max Range Value.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

Current Calibration.name: Current Calibration
Current Calibration.description: Read or Write the current calibration coefficient

Application Type.name: Application Type
Application Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case

Reset Min and Max Measured Values.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
Reset Min and Max Measured Values.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value
